literals: 'Forget a previously added Postman API key'
'Show the Postman API key associated with given name'
'Switch to using a particular previously added Postman API key'
"only one of '--add', '--list', '--switch', '--delete', '--show', or '--current' may be specified"
'--name and --key may not be combined with other than --add flag'
'--name and --key must both be specified if either one is specified'
the postman key with name '${name}' was added and is now current
the postman key with name '${name}' is now current
${name} is not a previously added postman key
${name} is not a previously added postman key
the postman key with name '${name}' is removed from the credential store
the postman key with name '${name}' is removed from the credential store
'${name}' was the current key; use 'nim auth postman [ --add | --switch ] to establish a new one
${name} does not denote a previously added postman key
comments: Add a postman key.  Called for --add with combination --name + --key
